result.name: Integrative Genomic Analysis Reveals Shared Loci for Reproductive and Productive Traits in Yorkshire Pigs
result.description: This project focuses on the integrative genomic analysis of Yorkshire pigs, aiming to identify shared loci associated with both reproductive and productive traits. By leveraging genomic data, we seek to uncover genetic factors that influence key characteristics in this breed, enhancing breeding strategies and improving overall productivity. The findings from this study are expected to contribute valuable insights into the genetic basis of traits critical for livestock improvement.
result.center: College of Animal Sciences, Zhejiang University
